markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Grippli Archer](/Monsters.aspx?ID=448)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

These sharpshooters are renowned for their patience and their accuracy.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Grippli Archer](/Monsters.aspx?ID=448)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Grippli" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=264" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #146: Cult of Cinders](/Sources.aspx?ID=7) pg. 87

**Perception** +10; darkvision

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Grippli](/Languages.aspx?ID=48)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +9, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +6, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +8, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +11, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** +0

**Wis** +3

**Cha** -1
</row>

**Items**
[Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=77) (30 arrows)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 20 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +10 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 44

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, climb 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shortsword +11 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d6+3 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shortbow +11 ([deadly 1d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6+2 piercing

**Hail of Arrows** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The grippli archer makes three ranged Strikes with their shortbow, all against a single target. Combine the damage of any Strikes that hit for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses.

**Jungle Stride**   A grippli ignores difficult terrain in forests and jungles.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-110" />
name: Grippli Archer

Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 18 Unspecific Lore : DC 16 Specific Lore : DC 13 Grippli Archer Source Pathfinder #146: Cult of Cinders pg. 87 Perception +10; darkvision Languages Common, Grippli Skills Acrobatics +9, Athletics +6, Nature +8, Stealth +11, Survival +8 Str +1 Dex +4 Con +2 Int +0 Wis +3 Cha -1 Items Leather Armor, Shortbow (30 arrows) --- AC 20 Fort +9 Ref +11 Will +10 HP 44 --- Speed 25 feet, climb 20 feet Melee Single Action shortsword +11 (Agile, Finesse, versatile S), Damage 1d6+3 piercing Ranged Single Action shortbow +11 (deadly 1d10, range increment 60 feet, reload 0), Damage 1d6+2 piercing Hail of Arrows Two Actions The grippli archer makes three ranged Strikes with their shortbow, all against a single target. Combine the damage of any Strikes that hit for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses. Jungle Stride A grippli ignores difficult terrain in forests and jungles.
